info_block.text:
<b>[Feature Parity] Max Proxies + SharedFlows per Environment

Under the Subscription 2021 plan, Apigee X has a limit of 6000 Proxies + SharedFlow.

Apigee hybrid supports : 4,250 Proxies + SharedFlow.(Subscription 2021) Apigee hybrid: 6,000 Proxies + SharedFlow. (Subscription 2024)
